summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Transportation and Infrastructure Committee of the City of Dallas is holding a special called meeting on December 5, 2023, at 11:00 AM. The meeting will take place in the Council Chambers on the 6th floor of City Hall and will be available for public attendance both in-person and via video conference.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The primary focus of the meeting is to conduct interviews for candidates for the Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport Board. This will involve discussions led by Council Member Omar Narvaez, who serves as the Chair of the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee.

**Important Details**:  
The agenda includes a briefing on the qualifications and suitability of the appointee candidates for the airport board. The meeting may also involve an executive session to discuss legal matters, property negotiations, or personnel evaluations, as permitted under Texas law.

**Action Items**:  
The committee is expected to evaluate the candidates and potentially make recommendations for appointments to the Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport Board. Approval of these appointments will be sought during the meeting. 

The meeting will be broadcast live, and public participation is encouraged, with provisions for virtual attendance.
